infolog.description:
• System administrator at Infolog S.r.l., where I worked with the development team to create a web application for warehouse management.
  • Refactored the Microsoft SQL Server database.

seta.description:
• Internship at the public transport company SETA S.p.A., where I developed the software for generating audio files for announcements on buses, currently used across the entire fleet in Modena, Reggio Emilia and Piacenza.
  • Training of a machine learning model for passenger counting using onboard cameras.

fertec.description:
• Design and development of a microservice system for an oxygenator production plant, from the general architecture to Raspberry Pi devices on Arch Linux.
  • Development of cost analysis software and a Flutter app to interface with medical devices.

freelance.description:
• Built an eSIM e-commerce platform based on external APIs.
  • Integrated with Stripe, PayPal and Airwallex.
  • Dashboard for viewing remaining data threshold, with eSIM top-up and replacement features.
  • Admin management for product insertion, logic for percentage and absolute discounts.
  • Knowledge base page and virtual assistant integration.
  • Development of a SaaS product for data visualization and sending commands to agricultural devices. Communication via Apache Kapua framework.

bamboosim.title: BambooSIM
bamboosim.description: An online eSIM card store with a custom CMS for managing products, orders and customers. Integration with multiple payment gateways and cloud services.

ezaffitto.title: ezaffitto
ezaffitto.description: Fully automated rental ad collector from various websites with AI (OpenAI) parsing structured as microservices.

kinocafe.title: Kinó Café
kinocafe.description: Website for a café to manage orders, print receipts via WebSockets to a POS printer, send data to an ESP32 display using the Web Serial API, show the menu, serve as a front page, and handle user registration.

vhfesuperiori.title: VHF e superiori
vhfesuperiori.description: An event manager and social network for radio amateurs curated by volunteers. A place to share your creations, connections (QSO) and meet new people.

occupalostudente.title: Occupa lo Studente
occupalostudente.description: A web application for job searching that connects companies and students of the I.T.I.S. E. Fermi di Modena. Institutional login via Google OAuth 2.0.

tpldisplay.title: TPL Display
tpldisplay.description: Real-time bus departure board, dockerized, interfaced with the TPL data of Bologna and Modena, with caching (Redis) and automatic update.

wolfsurvival.title: Wolf Survival
wolfsurvival.description: Website of a survival school with Next.js frontend and backend connected to the Meta (Facebook) API to show the latest courses, photos and videos of the activities carried out.
